Well with specified discharge¶

class ttim.well.DischargeWell(model, xw=0, yw=0, rw=0.1, tsandQ=[(0.0, 1.0)], res=0.0, layers=0, label=None)[source]¶

Well with non-zero and potentially variable discharge through time

headinside(t, derivative=0)¶

Returns head inside the well for the layers that the well is screened in
